name: Prince of Pilgrims
description:
Click and drag to send your prince around his stolen kingdom, recruiting allied soldiers to reclaim your cities!

v1.0. Uploaded for Brackeys Jam 2022.2. This submission was made 20 minutes late, and then revised a couple of times to get the i-frame scaling right, all within the grace hour. I'm still waiting for admins of the jam to migrate this to the actual jam submission.

Notes:

- Lots of bugs and UX issues. I probably picked too hard of a project to tackle in a week, but what's here is finishable, at least. I hope players will still be able to enjoy what's here, though I know there's plenty about the game that isn't executed / communicated well at this stage.

Requirements:

- Play in full screen! (1080p preferred)

- A mouse with a scroll-wheel is required
